images.copyright: Aurora borealis above the Brooks Range in Alaska (© Noppawat Tom Charoensinphon/Getty Images)
images.title: Light show on a lonesome highway
images.caption: Aurora borealis
images.desc: You don't have to go all the way to Alaska to see the northern lights (they've been spotted as far south as Hawaii). But based on this stunner of a photo, we recommend it. And the farther north the better: Auroras are more frequent and intense the closer you are to the North Pole.
images.bsTitle: Light show on a lonesome highway
